title: Additional channels

detailed_design.description: Parent/tracking item for adding more messaging channels (Discord, WhatsApp, etc.) beyond the second channel (PBI-045). Each new channel is a substantial integration; prioritise by user need and maintenance cost. Prefer adapter abstraction so intent-based routing and security stay central.
detailed_design.solution: Create per-channel PBIs when a specific channel is prioritised; use PBI-045 as the pattern.

user_stories.story: As a user, I may want to use my-agent from additional channels (e.g. Discord, WhatsApp) beyond the first two.
